name: VtexPullRequestPublish
friendlyName: Build a vtex stable app in a pull request
description: This task will build a Vtex app in a pull request in stable mode
author: MaikRestrepo

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: VTEX API KEY
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can get the API KEY from the VTEX admin panel, go to the account settings and then to the API keys section.

inputs.name: apiToken
inputs.label: VTEX API TOKEN
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can get the API TOKEN from the VTEX admin panel, go to the account settings and then to the API keys section.

inputs.name: account
inputs.label: VTEX ACCOUNT
inputs.helpMarkDown: The account name of the VTEX store

inputs.name: publishCommand
inputs.label: Pass the publish command to execute
inputs.helpMarkDown: This flag will generate a beta version of the app.
